about_hero.title: My Journey & Passion
about_hero.description: Get to know the person behind the code. A story of curiosity, learning, and building.

about_story.title: From Classroom to Real-World Development
about_story.p1: I am currently in my **5th semester** of Computer Science. University provides the foundation in theory and algorithms, but I complement this with practical learning outside the classroom to gain hands-on experience.
about_story.p2: I am a self-motivated developer, continuously exploring technologies like Next.js, cloud computing, and full-stack development. My focus is on creating real-world solutions that combine academic knowledge with industry practices.

workflow.title: How I Work
workflow.subtitle: A structured process to ensure quality and efficiency.

1.title: Discovery & Planning
1.desc: Understanding your goals, target audience, and requirements to create a solid roadmap.

2.title: Design & Prototyping
2.desc: Creating wireframes and high-fidelity designs to visualize the user experience before coding.

3.title: Development
3.desc: Writing clean, scalable code using modern technologies like Next.js to build the solution.

4.title: Testing & Deployment
4.desc: rigorous testing for performance and bugs, followed by a secure launch to the cloud.

about_cta.title: Let's Build Something Amazing Together
about_cta.subtitle: I am currently open for full-time opportunities and freelance projects. If you're interested in working together, let's connect.
